modName: Alexandria Follower by germanware and UUNP Bodyslide Preset - DELETED
summary: Adds a totally necessary follower called Alexandria, perfect for some screenies. I also included the bodyslide preset for UUNP.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][font=Georgia][i][b][u]Update 1:[/u][/b] Added an optional file to download in case you don't want the Face Tattoo.[/i]

[/font][/size][size=4][font=Georgia][b][center]- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -[/center]
[/b]Hello again. This is my second follower. I'm still really bad at this modding thing.[/font]

[font=Georgia]Do you want her for Newrim (SSE)? [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/16632]Here you go[/url], make sure to thank [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/40101665]bchick3[/url] for her work.[/font]

[b][center]- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -[/center][/b]
[font=Georgia]- Name: Alexandria (yeah, like the city. I was playing a lot of AC Origins when i knew i wanted to create a character and use this name)[/font]
[font=Georgia]- Weight: 100[/font]
[font=Georgia]- Race: Redguard[/font]
[font=Georgia]- Marriable: Get down on your knees and find out yourself.[/font]
[font=Georgia]- Body type: Custom UUNP (it's basically a slightly thicker version of 7BO)[/font]
[font=Georgia]- No spells, no traits, no lore, no background story, no nothing. As all my followers, she's intended mostly for screenshots. Man, i haven't properly played Skyrim in a few years.[/font]
[font=Georgia]- Location: You can find her at the Silver-Blood Inn, in Markarth. She totally does not stick out like a sore thumb.

Lastly, she comes with the black bikini as a default outfit. Use a mod like Amazing Follower Tweaks to change it or console commands.
[/font]
[font=Georgia]If you install this follower, don't keep her all to yourself. Share some screenshots with the rest of us.
[/font]
[u][center][font=Georgia]If you like the follower, please don't forget to [color=#6aa84f]Endorse[/color] it so more people can discover it.[/font]
[font=Georgia]On the contrary if you don't like it, feel free to leave a suggestion.[/font][/center][/u]
[b]- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -[/b]

[font=Georgia]See her in action

[youtube]vTXZrqdRpCQ[/youtube][/font]

[b]- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
[/b]
[u]FAQ (just in case)[/u]
[b][color=#ffd966]Q: CBBE body?[/color][/b]
[font=Georgia]A: Nope.[/font]
[b][color=#ffd966]Q: Glossiness/Oily body?[/color][/b]
[font=Georgia]A: Some of the screenshots have the glossiness but don't worry, she won't have it when you install the mod. If you want to add it, check [/font][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JUIPImauPhY]this video[/url][font=Georgia].[/font]
[b][color=#ffd966]Q: Will you release some of your other characters on to the wild?[/color][/b]
[font=Georgia]A: Eventually.[/font]
[b][color=#ffd966]Q: What ENB are you using?[/color][/b]
[font=Georgia]A: Snapdragon Prime[/font]
[b][color=#ffd966]Q: What mod is that gray room on the screenshots from?[/color][/b]
[font=Georgia]A: Aether Suite.[/font]
[b][color=#ffd966]Q: Can you upload it to "X" website?[/color][/b]
[font=Georgia]A: I can but i won't. Nexus is perfectly fine and objectively the best mod site in the entire internet. If you don't like it, i don't know what you're doing here.[/font]
[b][color=#e69138][u]Outfits used on the screenshots:[/u][/color][/b] [i]MiniBikini and PeroPeroArmorPack3, both from Goma Pero.

[/i][font=Georgia]- - Please ignore the name of the .esp as she is NOT a standalone follower. I simply forgot to change the name and didn't want to go back and do that all over again. Thanks - -[/font]
[b][center]
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -[/center][/b]
[u]Huge Thanks to:[/u]

HHaleyy for [/font][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602]FairSkinComplexion[/url]
[font=Georgia]Kalilies for [/font][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdos[/url]
[font=Georgia]nerune for [/font][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56056]Mikan Eyes
[/url][font=Georgia]Raven for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45641]Raven's Warpaint[/url]
Rutah for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49979]Rutah Tattoo Pack[/url]
tetrodoxin for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86208]Freckle Mania 2[/url]
Goma Pero for [url=http://gomaperopero.tumblr.com/post/171194330210/mini-bikini-mod-update-%E3%83%93%E3%82%AD%E3%83%8B%E8%81%B7%E4%BA%BA%E3%81%AE%E6%9C%9D%E3%81%AF%E6%97%A9%E3%81%84]MiniBikini[/url]ï»¿ and Kokoro for the [url=https://kokoro-uunpwardrobe.tumblr.com/post/171349661839/gomaperopero-mini-bikini-uunp-download-require]UUNP conversion[/url][/font][/size]

[size=4][font=Georgia][center]- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -[/center][/font][/size]

author: germanware
